item.title: Advection and non-climate impacts on the South Pole Ice Core
2019 South Pole field season
item.description: In December, I headed to the South Pole for a third field season, wrapping our survey of regional ice flow. Like last year, this was a very quick season with only about two weeks at the Pole. As in previous years, the field season was timed to span the solstice so as to get the warmest weather at the South Pole (~-10 F this year).
